## FaastModuleProxy.stats() method

Statistics for a specific function or the entire faast.js module.

**Signature:**

```typescript
stats(functionName?: string): FunctionStats;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

functionName


</td><td>

string


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ The name of the function to retrieve statistics for. If the function does not exist or has not been invoked, a new instance of [FunctionStats](./faastjs.functionstats.md) is returned with zero values. If `functionName` omitted (undefined), then aggregate statistics are returned that summarize all cloud functions within this faast.js module.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
**Returns:**

[FunctionStats](./faastjs.functionstats.md)

an snapshot of [FunctionStats](./faastjs.functionstats.md) at a point in time.
